name: Nevin Fucking Dies (The Game)
description:
I made this in 100 minutes jjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjj

GMZ Download: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Da36M66lQ_m6cB0XLy0QFEPJRja3Bd5S/view?usp=shari...

The theme was "Twisted Classic," where we took a classic video game (in this case, Super Mario Bros. ) and attempted  to twist it a bit.

CONTROLS:

R- Restart the game

WASD - Movement

W & Space - Jump

F1 - Screen resize

F - Full screen
